data.message: Why are we not allowed to report spam anymore?

replies.message: Hey Mariya. You can report spam using the report links near most things on Facebook. Learn more in our Help Center: http://on.fb.me/1ASF51v. -Sarah
I know how but why doesn't it work or do anything for that matter.
Hey Mariya. This sounds like a bug. Can you please help us track these issues and submit the problem to support through our Help Center? http://on.fb.me/1DlMUAF -Sarah
clicking report for spam doesn't have the option to report it to facebook......

Facebook !! i had a fight with some friends on facebook and they report me as spam !! and facebook block my fb account !! and i have been trying to get it back 3 months ago !! facebook said that im under the age of 13 !! and im 22 years old !! give me back my facebook account !!!!!!!!!!!!
